heroSection.description: I’m enthusiastic about leveraging technology to build impactful solutions. With a focus on Web Development, Artificial Intelligence, and Data Science, I’m dedicated to exploring new possibilities and creating innovative applications. Let’s work together to bring exciting ideas to life

aboutMe.description: Hello! I'm Sarang Mistry, a Computer Science student at the University of Houston, set to graduate in December 2024. My journey in technology is driven by a passion for innovation and a commitment to excellence. I explore various domains, including web development, data science, and artificial intelligence. Beyond coding, I’m a dedicated tutor at the University of Houston, where I help students master programming concepts and improve their problem-solving skills. I’m excited to apply my skills and knowledge to real-world challenges and contribute to innovative projects. Feel free to explore my portfolio to see some of the work I’ve done and connect with me to discuss potential collaborations or opportunities.
